scenario.title: Change of Plans at the Farmer's Market
scenario.context: A sunny Saturday afternoon at a bustling farmer's market
scenario.description: Two friends, Alex and Jamie, planned to meet at the farmer's market to enjoy the afternoon together. However, Jamie arrived late and couldn't find a parking spot due to the market's popularity. Jamie calls Alex to suggest a change of plans.
scenario.speaker1_persona: Alex is easygoing and flexible, always willing to adapt to changes without getting stressed out. He has a positive attitude and is always upbeat, even when things don't go as planned.
scenario.speaker2_persona_1: Jamie, with high EQ, is apologetic about the situation and is open to alternatives. She is calm and composed, despite the unexpected change in plans.
scenario.speaker2_persona_2: Jamie, with low EQ, is frustrated and stressed about the situation. She is quick to blame external factors and is inflexible to changes.
scenario.speaker2_persona_3: Jamie, with another low EQ, is anxious and overwhelmed by the change in plans. She tends to overreact and struggles to cope with the unexpected situation.
scenario.speaker2_persona_high: Jamie, with high EQ, is apologetic about the situation and is open to alternatives. She is calm and composed, despite the unexpected change in plans.
scenario.speaker2_persona_low: Jamie, with another low EQ, is anxious and overwhelmed by the change in plans. She tends to overreact and struggles to cope with the unexpected situation.

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: Jamie, where are you? The fresh strawberries are almost sold out!

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: I'm really sorry, Alex. I'm stuck looking for parking. This place is packed!

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: Oh no! That's a bummer. We were really looking forward to this.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: Yeah, it is. How about we change our plans a bit? We can meet at that cozy coffee shop nearby instead, less crowd and easy parking.

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: That sounds like a good idea, Jamie. I've heard they serve great pastries too.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: Perfect! I'll see you there in 10 minutes, Alex. Again, sorry for the change.
